message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.CV. 

The paper proposes a novel representation for text documents based on aggregating word embedding vectors into document embeddings. This falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP) and specifically text classification. Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also uses unsupervised learning techniques, which suggests that it could also fall under cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper involves clustering and codebook learning, which could be relevant to cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper mentions the Vector of Locally-Aggregated Descriptors used for image representation, which suggests a possible connection to cs.CV (Computer Vision).
